text: The Top 100 Crime Novels of All Time is a list published in 1990 by the Crime Writers' Association (CWA). Five years later, the Mystery Writers of America (MWA) published a similar list named The Top 100 Mystery Novels of All Time. Many titles can be found in both lists.The Crown Crime Companion "The Top 100 Mystery Novels of All Time Selected by the Mystery Writers of America", annotated by Otto Penzler and compiled by Mickey Friedman New York, (1995) == The CWA Top 100 == No. Title Author Country Year 1 The Daughter of Time Josephine Tey Scotland 1951 2 The Big Sleep Raymond Chandler USA 1939 3 The Spy Who Came In From the Cold John le Carré England 1963 4 Gaudy Night Dorothy L.
